title: ‘Play’ app lets you access YouTube videos directly from your home screen
content:
The YouTube app lets you mark videos to watch them later, but there aren’t many options available for organizing the videos you pick. With “Play,” a new app for iOS and macOS devices, you can not only bookmark YouTube videos but also organize and even access them from your home screen.

more…

The post ‘Play’ app lets you access YouTube videos directly from your home screen appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: With "Play" you can not only bookmark YouTube videos but also organize and even access them from your iOS home screen.
